TopicTitle: Share your epic missions/landings/dockings that you are proud of!

Articles.Content:
As the title says share your epic missions/landings/dockings that you are proud of!

I will start with my mission.

I take off with the Buran Space Shuttle at KSC as I get into orbit, I then rendezvous with my "Space Station Alpha", and refuel the shuttle. I then go towards to Duna, on an 400km orbit. I realize i'm out of fuel. I decide take up a vessel that is already landed at Duna, to refuel the Space Shuttle. So I rendezvous and dock with the Space Shuttle. I was a bit worried the ports wouldn't fit since the Shuttle has a slightly larger one, altough it worked. So I was bored and asked myself, what am I gonna do now? I just say YOLO(Sorry XD) in the Kerbal Feed Chat, I've decided to land with the space shuttle, upwards. So I decent fast down to the ground and burn very quickly. I realized I was going a bit horizontal, and I was loosing control, I was like well, OK, I failed. But then, I manage to slam to the ground at a velocity at 14.3 m/s. It was just about to fall to the side until I turned on the RCS and managed to get it on its feet. I'm very proud of this, I know many people will be like "noob". I'm new to this game, BTW.

So what are your epic missions and landings? Please share them!

Hey, that's more things than ever I've landed on Duna.

My Duna things total is:

1 Rover

1 Impactor

That's it.

http://imgur.com/a/c8UIW#0

Here is my mission to Gilly and Eve.My engine blew up when i staged in Eve's atmosphere , landed using only the chute and the landing legs snapped off.

Oh and btw , that is one single nuclear engine mounted on a 150 ton ship.The whole mission was 7 hours in real time.

Edited June 2, 2013 by SoldierHair
Maybe it had to do with the words "Docking" and "epic" being so close to each other in the title.
I visited most of the Kerbol System and i still didn't managed to dock ONCE.

I visited most of the Kerbol System and i still didn't managed to dock ONCE.

I've done docking several times. It's not the actual docking that bugs me, it's getting a rendevouz with the target that seems so impossible to me. I stopped docking entirely after I tried to rearrange my space station and ended up losing all three components.
I docked a big L-shaped section trying to re-arrange my space station once. What a pain in the L. Probably took me 2 hours or so. Planning a space station before launching it is for wimps
